EngageManifest.Title: Fresh Rotator
EngageManifest.Description:
Displays the slide's content at 870px wide by 330px tall.

This template features content displayed in a bordered frame with a subtle shadow below, and next and back buttons on the sides. The template displays the slides content, and is designed with a subtle gradient background via css.

This template is designed especially for Engage:Fresh, but can be used with any skin. The template was designed with fixed dimensions intentially; to change the dimensions of the template, simply open up the style.css and alter away!
